vlive.korean: 불쌍해서 인정. She's so pitiful. We should allow it. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '너비가 너희의 흥을 깨워주겠다'

vlive.english: Why? Because you pity us? - Why?
